nodes.description: Services in this level are below the minimum standard to ship to production. You should address your failing checks as soon as possible.
nodes.name: Beginner

nodes.description: Services in this level satisfy critical checks. This is the minimum standard to ship to production.
nodes.name: Bronze

nodes.description: Services in this level satisfy important and critical checks. This is considered healthy.
nodes.name: Silver

nodes.description: Services in this level satisfy critical, important and useful checks. This is the requirement for your highest tier services but all services should aspire to be in this level.
nodes.name: Gold
